scripts.build: parcel build helios-api.js --target node --detailed-report --no-minify --bundle-node-modules && yarn fix && yarn bundle
scripts.build:min: parcel build helios-api.js --target node --detailed-report --bundle-node-modules && yarn fix
scripts.bundle: npm version prerelease && rm -r .cache && ( cd ../api_release && npm pack ../api )
